summary: Frontend testing completed for ETAP 1 implementation - Edge Score display and SearchInput component. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: SearchInput component is well-designed with proper icon positioning (left-4 for icon, pl-11 for input padding)
Edge Score display uses consistent color coding across ActorsPage cards and ActorProfile header
Exit Conditions block properly displays priority levels (HIGH, CRITICAL, MEDIUM) with appropriate styling
seed_data_creation: N/A - all data is mocked on frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: ETAP 1 features verified: 1) Edge Score badge displays correctly in ActorProfile header (next to actor name) and on ActorsPage cards (top-right corner), 2) Exit Conditions block renders after Do NOT Follow If section on ActorProfile, 3) Default sort on ActorsPage is by Edge Score (highest first), 4) SearchInput component properly positions icon without overlapping text on all pages (ActorsPage, EntitiesPage, SignalsPage, WatchlistPage, TokensPage)

ActorProfile_EdgeScore_Header.details: Edge Score badge (78 for Vitalik, 86 for Alameda) displays correctly in header next to actor name

ActorProfile_ExitConditions_Block.details: Exit Conditions block displays after Do NOT Follow If section with proper priority labels (HIGH, CRITICAL, MEDIUM)

ActorsPage_EdgeScore_Cards.details: Edge Score displays on all actor cards in top-right corner with color coding (green for high, amber for medium, red for low)

ActorsPage_DefaultSort_EdgeScore.details: Default sort is by Edge Score (highest first) - verified dropdown shows 'Edge Score' and actors sorted 91, 86, 84, 78, 52, 45, 28, 15

SearchInput_ActorsPage.details: Search icon properly positioned, text does not overlap with icon

SearchInput_EntitiesPage.details: Search icon properly positioned, text does not overlap with icon

SearchInput_SignalsPage.details: Search icon properly positioned, text does not overlap with icon

SearchInput_WatchlistPage.details: Search icon properly positioned, text does not overlap with icon

SearchInput_TokensPage.details: Search icon properly positioned, text does not overlap with icon

mocked_data_note: All actor data is mocked on frontend in ActorProfile.jsx and ActorsPage.jsx
